amendment.description: Amendment requires certain procedures (known as Code Adam) be established and followed when a child is reported lost or missing in a Federal building.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 108-48 to require certain procedures to be established and followed when a child is reported lost or missing in a public building, commonly known as a `Code Adam' alert.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Acevedo-Vila amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
